short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight rows in your YNAB transaction list based on Flag color

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YNAB accounts page allow you to flag transactions with a color, this extension enhances the functionaltiy by highlighting the entire transaction row with a lighter version of the same color.
